sentence: Trump rages against Brian Kemp for purportedly conspiring against Marjorie Taylor Greene Watrous said that after sitting on the steps for approximately 15 minutes, he walked away and met a woman who had a YouTube channel whom he told he had gone inside and there wasnt much to see.? The woman wanted to go inside the Capitol and Watrous stated he reentered the Capitol with her.? Perhaps sealing Watrous fate was this interchange with the judge, as reported by Syracuse.com: Watrous, who was seeking probation rather than jail, told Howell that he was 100% on the side of Capitol Police,? according to MacFarlane.
author: Ray Hartmann
title: Capitol rioter gets smacked down by judge after claiming he was not 'part of that mob'

sentence: 2 hr ago 08:14 AM EDT Trump Blames Georgia Republicans for Taylor Greene 'Going Through Hell' Former president Donald Trump has come to the rescue of Greene on Thursday, blaming Georgia's Governor Brian Kemp and Secretary of State Brad Raffensperger to allow "a horrible thing to happen to a very popular Republican."
author: Giulia Carbonaro
title: Marjorie Taylor Greene Testimony Live: Opening Statements Underway

author: Tia Mitchell
title: The Jolt: Brian Kemp headed to David Perdue's hometown, with David Perdue's cousin

sentence: "The Governor of Georgia, Brian Kemp, and Secretary of State, Brad Raffensperger, perhaps in collusion with the Radical Left Democrats, have allowed a horrible thing to happen to a very popular Republican, Congresswoman Marjorie Taylor Greene," Trump said in a statement Thursday.
author: Zoe Strozewski
title: Brad Raffensperger Sides With Judge, Keeps Marjorie Taylor Greene on Ballot

sentence: They should renominate Brian Kemp for a second term as governor.
author: The Editors
title: Yes on Kemp, No on Greene

sentence: Trump's biggest endorsement stake was in Georgia, where he endorsed challengers to two incumbentsRaffensperger and Governor Brian Kempas retaliation for their refusal to help him overturn the results of the 2020 presidential election.
author: Katherine Fung
title: Marjorie Taylor Greene Wins GOP Primary and Is More Popular Than Ever
